title: From Audrey Hepburn to Diana Ross: How a place on the best-dressed list is the making of a fashion icon
text:
The making of a fashion icon today requires a whole village of personals: stylist, trainer, manicurist, hair and makeup artists. To become a fashion icon on a global stage or just amongst your friends, you need to be Queer Eye-d first. This summer Netflix debuted Styling Hollywood, following married couple Jason Bolden and Adair Curtis as they work with A-List clients such as Taraji P. Henson and Yara Shahidi.

The purpose of all this expense and effort? Almost 80 years on from its launch, a place on the International Best Dressed List remains the ultimate accolade for a celebrity, elevating them from public figure to fashion icon status.
